name: BioLite Charge 40 PD Power Bank
description: In a front-country campground or way out in the wild, life takes power. Now equipped with USB-C PD ports, BioLite’s Charge line can top up your compatible devices faster than ever.USB-C PD port fast charges compatible devices.10,000mAh capacity charges in only 2.5h via USB-C PD at 18W (up to 18W).Pocket-friendly, rounded edges.4-level LED power indicator lets you know if battery is charging or discharging.Ports: USB-C PD female – 5-12V up to 3A (18W Max) (charging/discharging), 2 x type-A USB female (discharging).
